name: Dark Age (kxue1)
description:
In this game, the players are randomly be chosen as heroes or the undead. There are total 3 types of heroes you can choose. And each hero character has three unique skills to use, but they can only use one at a time. Also, undead has 5 skills as well. Hero has 5 hearts as total health. The undead has ten hearts. Heroes and undead boss all can choose to do normal attack or guard at one round. Normal attack could do 1 damage, and guard could reduce half damage from the skills or attack.  The goal is to defeat the undead so the heroes could win the game, otherwise they lose.

There are total three tokens you can use as your move: attack, defend, skill. 

Link on playingcard.io: https://playingcards.io/avvwas
